answerText: The Death of Klinghoffer [10] In addition to The Death of Klinghoffer, this minimalist composer wrote about the 9/11 terrorist attacks in On the Transmigration of Souls. He also wrote El Niño and Doctor Atomic.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | Minnesota A and Dartmouth A and South Detroit University | 8 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The titled character of this opera is Palestinian dude, and it is based on an event involving a ship called Achille Lauro. For 10 points each:   [10] Name this opera based on that 1985 event.
